content:
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Package_IG_Release_Policy_Issue

@Josh Mandel @Ewout Kramer @Lloyd McKenzie @Rick Geimer is this a good summary of the discussion we had a couple of weeks ago on this subject?

I think so!

Note "and a new package with the new patch number is" is missing a final verb ("released")
The background / details are super helpful on this, thanks!

I agree, looks good. Only thing I would add would be examples of selecting a minimum version number, any package, etc. after the following sentence:

"This allows dependent packages to indicate a minimum version that they depend on, to ensure they get whatever fixes are needed, or to specify any version if none of the changes are relevant."

http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Package_IG_Release_Policy_Issue

Josh Mandel Ewout Kramer Lloyd McKenzie Rick Geimer is this a good summary of the discussion we had a couple of weeks ago on this subject?

Agree!
